# http://aurelio.net/moneylog/
# MoneyLog test file.
# 100% OK when: no errors raised, month balance is always zero.
#
# DO NOT EDIT. Automatically generated by ok-generator.py.
#
# Use these settings to test this file:
#   reportType = 'm';
#   checkDateFrom = false;
#   useLegacyDataFormat = false;
#   dataFiles = ['test/ok.txt'];


########## Blank lines with TABs and spaces (ignored)
#
 
    
	
 	
	 
		 
 	 	 


########## Gotchas
#
# Tag delimiter alone: no tag, no description
2000-01-01 -1 |
#
# Pipes in description
2000-01-02 -1 tag1,tag2||
2000-01-03 -1 tag1,tag2|one|pipe
2000-01-04 -1 tag1,tag2||two pipes around|
#
# Comma confusion in tags
2000-01-05 -1 tag1,,tag2|two commas
2000-01-06 -1 , ,tag1,	,tag2,	 	,| comma nightmare
2000-01-07 -1 ,,,,,|only commas
#
# Now the positive values to zero the month balance
2000-01-99 2 reset no tag
2000-01-99 5 tag1,tag2| reset tags


########## Delimiter formats
#
2000-02-01 -1 description
2000-02-01    -1    description
2000-02-01	-1	description
2000-02-01 	-1 	description
2000-02-01	 -1	 description
2000-02-01		 -1		 description
2000-02-01 	 	 -1 	 	 description
2000-02-02 -1 tag| description
2000-02-02    -1    tag|    description
2000-02-02	-1	tag|	description
2000-02-02 	-1 	tag| 	description
2000-02-02	 -1	 tag|	 description
2000-02-02		 -1		 tag|		 description
2000-02-02 	 	 -1 	 	 tag| 	 	 description
2000-02-03 -1 tag | description
2000-02-03    -1    tag    |    description
2000-02-03	-1	tag	|	description
2000-02-03 	-1 	tag 	| 	description
2000-02-03	 -1	 tag	 |	 description
2000-02-03		 -1		 tag		 |		 description
2000-02-03 	 	 -1 	 	 tag 	 	 | 	 	 description
2000-02-04 -1 tag | descrip tion
2000-02-04    -1    tag    |    descrip    tion
2000-02-04	-1	tag	|	descrip	tion
2000-02-04 	-1 	tag 	| 	descrip 	tion
2000-02-04	 -1	 tag	 |	 descrip	 tion
2000-02-04		 -1		 tag		 |		 descrip		 tion
2000-02-04 	 	 -1 	 	 tag 	 	 | 	 	 descrip 	 	 tion
#
# Leading spaces are discouraged, but they are stripped by ML
 2000-02-05 -1 description
    2000-02-05    -1    description
	2000-02-05	-1	description
 	2000-02-05 	-1 	description
	 2000-02-05	 -1	 description
		 2000-02-05		 -1		 description
 	 	 2000-02-05 	 	 -1 	 	 description
#
# Now the positive values to zero the month balance
2000-02-99 14 description
2000-02-99 21 tag|description


########## Tag formats
#
2000-03-01 -1 tag|
2000-03-01 -1 tag|description
2000-03-02 -1 tag |
2000-03-02 -1 tag |description
2000-03-03 -1 tag    |
2000-03-03 -1 tag    |description
2000-03-04 -1 tag	|
2000-03-04 -1 tag	|description
2000-03-05 -1 tag 	|
2000-03-05 -1 tag 	|description
2000-03-06 -1 tag	 |
2000-03-06 -1 tag	 |description
2000-03-07 -1 tag		 |
2000-03-07 -1 tag		 |description
2000-03-08 -1 tag 	 	 |
2000-03-08 -1 tag 	 	 |description
2000-03-09 -1 tag1,tag2|
2000-03-09 -1 tag1,tag2|description
2000-03-10 -1 tag1, tag2|
2000-03-10 -1 tag1, tag2|description
2000-03-11 -1 tag1, tag2 |
2000-03-11 -1 tag1, tag2 |description
2000-03-12 -1 tag1,    tag2|
2000-03-12 -1 tag1,    tag2|description
2000-03-13 -1 tag1,    tag2    |
2000-03-13 -1 tag1,    tag2    |description
2000-03-14 -1 tag1,	tag2|
2000-03-14 -1 tag1,	tag2|description
2000-03-15 -1 tag1,	tag2	|
2000-03-15 -1 tag1,	tag2	|description
2000-03-16 -1 tag1, 	tag2|
2000-03-16 -1 tag1, 	tag2|description
2000-03-17 -1 tag1, 	tag2 	|
2000-03-17 -1 tag1, 	tag2 	|description
2000-03-18 -1 tag1,	 tag2|
2000-03-18 -1 tag1,	 tag2|description
2000-03-19 -1 tag1,	 tag2	 |
2000-03-19 -1 tag1,	 tag2	 |description
2000-03-20 -1 tag1,		 tag2|
2000-03-20 -1 tag1,		 tag2|description
2000-03-21 -1 tag1,		 tag2		 |
2000-03-21 -1 tag1,		 tag2		 |description
2000-03-22 -1 tag1, 	 	 tag2|
2000-03-22 -1 tag1, 	 	 tag2|description
2000-03-23 -1 tag1, 	 	 tag2 	 	 |
2000-03-23 -1 tag1, 	 	 tag2 	 	 |description
#
# Now the positive values to zero the month balance
2000-03-99 16 tag|
2000-03-99 30 tag1,tag2|

#
